Verses: 1 isakkaarudaiya Kumaarar, Tholaa, Poovaa, Yasup, Simron Ennum Naaluper.

2 tholaavin Kumaarar, Oosi, Reppaayaa, Yeriyel, Yakmaayi, Ipsaam, Saamuvel Enbavargal; Tholaavukkup Pirandha Ivargal Thangal Pidhaakkal Vamsaththalaivarum Thangal Sandhadhigalile Paraakkiramasaaligalumaayirundhaargal; Dhaaveedhin Naatkalil Avargal Thogai Irubadhinaayiraththu Arunooruperaayirundhadhu.
3 oosiyin Kumaararil Oruvan Isragiyaa; Isragiyaavin Kumaarar, Migaayel, Obadhiyaa, Yovel, Ishiyaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Aindhuperum Thalaivaraayirundhaargal.
4 avargal Pidhaakkal Vamsaththaaraanavargal Sandhadhigalil Yuththamanusharaana Koottangal Muppaththaaraayiramper Avargalodirundhaargal; Avargalukku Anegam Penjaadhigalum Pillaigalum Irundhaargal.
5 isakkaarudaiya Matra Ellaa Vamsangalilum Avargalukku Sagodhararaana Paraakkiramasaaligal Thangal Vamsa Attavanaigalinpadiyellaam Enbaththezhaayiramperaayirundhaargal.
6 benyameen Kumaarar, Pelaa, Peger, Yedhiyaayel Ennum Moondruper.

7 pelaavin Kumaarar, Espon, Oosi, Oosiyel, Yerimodh, Iri Enbavargal; Ivargal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththil Paraakkiramasaaligalaana Aindhu Thalaivaraayirundhaargal; Ivargal Vamsa Attavanaikkullaanavargal Irubaththeeraayiraththu Muppaththunaaluper.
8 pegerin Kumaarar, Semiraa, Yovaas, Eliyesar, Eliyonaai, Umri, Yerimodh, Abiyaa, Aanadhodh, Alamedh Enbavargal; Ivargal Ellaarum Pegerin Kumaarar.
9 thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththalaivaraagiya Avargal Sandhadhigalin Attavanaikkullaana Paraakkiramaaligal Irubadhinaayiraththu Irunooruper.
10 yedhiyaayelin Kumaararil Oruvan Pilkaan; Pilkaanin Kumaarar, Eyoosh, Benyameen, Ekoodh, Kenaanaa, Seththaan, Tharshees, Agishaagaar Enbavargal.

11 yedhiyaayelin Kumaararaagiya Ivargal Ellaarum Thangal Pidhaakkal Vamsaththaaril Thalaivaraayirundhaargal; Ivargalil Yuththaththirkup Pogaththakka Sevagaraana Paraakkiramasaaligal Padhinezhaayiraththu Irunooruper.
12 suppeemum, Uppeemum Eerin Kumaarar, Oosim Aagerin Kumaararil Oruvan.
13 napthaliyin Kumaararaana Pilkaalin Peranmaar, Yaadhsiyel, Kooni, Edhser, Salloom Enbavargal.
14 manaaseyin Puththiraril Oruvan Kulasthreeyinidaththil Pirandha Asriyel; Avan Marumanaiyaattiyaagiya Araamiya Sthreeyinidaththil Keeleyaaththin Thagappanaagiya Maageer Pirandhaan.
15 maageer Maakkaal Ennum Perulla Uppeem Suppeem Enbavargalin Sagodhariyai Vivaagampanninaan; Manaaseyin Irandaam Kumaaran Seloppiyaadh; Seloppiyaaththirkuk Kumaaraththigalirundhaargal.
16 maageerin Penjaadhiyaagiya Maakkaal Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukkup Peres Endru Perittaal; Ivan Sagodharan Per Seres; Ivanudaiya Kumaarar Oolaam, Regem Enbavargal.
17 oolaamin Kumaararil Oruvan Pedhaan; Ivargal Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maageerukkup Pirandha Keeleyaadh Puththirar.
18 ivan Sagodhariyaagiya Ammolegedh Iskodhaiyum Abiyesaraiyum Maagalaavaiyum Petraal.
19 semidhaavin Kumaarar, Agiyaan, Segem, Likke, Aniyaam Enbavargal.
20 eppiraayeemin Kumaararil Oruvan Suththelaag; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Peredh; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Thaagaadh; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Elaadhaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Thaagaadh.

21 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Saabaadh; Ivanudaiya Kumaarar Kaththelaag, Edhser, Eliyaadh; Ivargal Dhesaththil Pirandha Kaaththooraarudaiya Aadumaadugalaip Pidikkapponapadiyaal Avargal Ivargalaik Kondrupottaargal.
22 avargal Thagappanaagiya Eppiraayeem Aneganaal Dhukkankondaadugaiyil, Avan Sagodharar Avanukku Aarudhal Sollavandhaargal.
23 pinbu Avan Than Penjaadhiyinidaththil Pravesiththadhinaal, Aval Karppandhariththu Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal; Avan, Than Kudumbaththukkuth Theengu Undaanadhinaal, Ivanukkup Pereeyaa Endru Perittaan.
24 ivanudaiya Kumaaraththiyaagiya Seraal Keezhppuramum Merpuramumaana Peththoronaiyum, Oosenseraavaiyum Kattinaval.
25 avanudaiya Kumaarar, Reppaag, Resep Enbavargal; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Thelaag; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Thaagaan.
26 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Laadhaan, Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Ammiyoodh; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Elishaamaa.
27 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Noon: Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Yosuvaa.

28 avargaludaiya Kaaniyaatchiyum, Vaasasthalangalum, Kizhakkeyirukkira Naaraanum, Merkeyirukkira Keserum Adhin Graamangalum, Peththelum Adhin Graamangalum, Seegemum Adhin Graamangalum, Kaasaamattukkumulla Adhan Graamangalum,

29 manaase Puththirarin Pakkaththile Pedhseyaanum Adhin Graamangalum, Thaanaagum Adhin Graamangalum, Megidhovum Adhin Graamangalum, Thorum Adhin Graamangalume; Ivvidangalil Isravelin Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppin Puththirar Kudiyirundhaargal.
30 aaserin Kumaarar, Imnaa, Isvaa, Isvi, Pereeyaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Sagodhari Seraal.
31 pereeyaavin Kumaarar, Eper, Malkiyel Enbavargal; Ivan Pirsaaveeththin Thagappan.
32 eper Yapleththaiyum, Someraiyum, Oththaamaiyum, Ivargal Sagodhariyaagiya Soogaalaiyum Petraan.
33 yapleththin Kumaarar Paasaag, Pimmaal, Asvaadh Enbavargal; Ivargale Yapleththin Kumaarar.
34 somerin Kumaarar Agi, Rogaa, Ekoobaa, Aaraam Enbavargal.
35 avan Sagodharanaagiya Elemin Kumaarar, Sopaag, Imnaa, Seles, Aamaal Enbavargal.
36 sopaakkin Kumaarar, Soovaag, Arneppar, Soogaal, Peri, Imraa,
37 peser, Odh, Sammaa, Silsaa, Idhraan, Peraa Enbavargal.
38 yeththerin Kumaarar, Eppunne, Pispaa, Aaraa Enbavargal.
39 ullaavin Kumaarar, Aaraag, Anniyel, Ridhsiyaa Enbavargal.

40 aaserin Puththiraraagiya Ivargal Ellaarum Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththalaivarum Therindhukollappatta Paraakkiramasaaligalum, Prabukkalin Thalaivarumaayirundhaargal; Avargal Vamsa Attavanaigalil Yuththaththirkup Pogaththakka Sevagarin Lakkam Irubaththaaraayiramper.
